2008/9/24 raj_sharath <raj_sharath@...>:
> Hi-
>

> "Junit2" in c:\small. The below is how i am running it
>

>
> The following is what i get as output.
>
> JUnit version 4.5
> Could not find class: Junit2
>
> Time: 0
>
> OK (0 tests)
>
> Why is that my junit cant be found.
>
